import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Form, Button, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import AdminLayout from '../../../Pages/Admin/components/AdminLayout'; const AddBeasiswa = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ nama: '', deskripsi: '', tipe: '', ipk: '', semester: '', fakultas: '', kuota: '', jadwalPendaftaran: '', jadwalSeleksi: '', logo: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Data beasiswa:', formData); alert('Beasiswa berhasil ditambahkan!'); }; return (
